meanings.definition: The sliding of a vehicle uncontrollably on a wet surface due to a loss of traction.
meanings.sent1: Aquaplaning can be dangerous during heavy rain.

meanings.sent3: The aquaplaning of the skateboard on the wet ramp was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like aquaplaning, slipping away without control.
meanings.sent5: The image of aquaplaning stuck in his mind like a vivid painting.
